location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter concerns the cost of repairs to the factory at Bushire. Includes an enclosed letter, dated 18 May 1814, from William Bruce to John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay, which makes the case for the repairs, and suggests that a monthly sum be set aside for the purpose of keeping the factory in repair.
